content.description: You will now listen to a dialogue. Afterwards, you will be asked several questions about what you have just heard. Select the best answer to each question from among the four choices. Now listen to the dialogue.

choices.label: Il invite son ami à faire un voyage avec lui.
Il invite son ami à aller dans un café.
Il propose de ramener son ami au garage.
Il propose de donner des chèques de voyage à son ami.

content.answer: Il invite son ami à aller dans un café.

unit.text: 5: Factors That Affect the Quality of Life

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
